item.title: Star quarterbacks falter as 49ers eye home Super Bowl - best of week 17
item.description: Our pick of week 17 looks at Josh Allen and Jalen Hurts' flaws, the Steelers' diminishing play-off hopes and the 49ers' home Super Bowl dream.

item.title: Man Utd sign Germany international Schuller
item.description: Manchester United have signed Germany international Lea Schuller from Bayern Munich until June 2029.

item.title: Anthony Joshua injured in fatal Nigeria car crash
item.description: The British heavyweight boxer suffered minor injuries in the crash which killed two people, near Lagos.

item.title: Kate Bush 'heartbroken' over friend missing at sea
item.description: Matthew Upham and another man went missing in the sea in Devon on Christmas Day.

item.title: Police at reservoir after light aircraft crash
item.description: Police remain at the scene after a reports small aircraft entered the water on Sunday.
